short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supports pull-to-refresh with touchscreens and precision touchpads, similar to overscroll history navigation.
short.zh_CN: 支持下拉以刷新通过触屏或精确式触摸板, 类似于水平超量滚动以触发历史导航

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supports pull-to-refresh with touchscreens and precision touchpads, similar to overscroll history navigation.

Just pull page down.
When pulled by 1/4 of viewport height, an indicator will be visible.
When pulled by 1/2 of viewport height, the indicator will be active.
